name: GitHub Emailer
description: A Python app that lets you follow GitHub organizations.

FROM_ADDR.description: Email address you want the app to send from.

TO_ADDR.description: Email address you want the app to send to.

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: Sendgrid API key granting 'Mail Send' full access.

GIST_ID.description: ID for the Gist where you list the organizations you want to follow.

UPDATE_DAY.description: Number of the week day on which you want to be emailed (0 for Monday to 6 for Sunday)
